headline.main: WAR DECLARATION URGED AT HARVARD; Dr. Conant Tells Students 'Our National Conscience Will Crow More Disturbed' by Delay

lead_paragraph: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., Sept. 23 -- An outright declaration of war on the Axis powers was urged today by Dr. James B. Conant, president of Harvard University, at the opening chapel service in the Harvard Memorial Church today.
abstract: war entry urged by Dr J B Conant
snippet: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., Sept. 23 -- An outright declaration of war on the Axis powers was urged today by Dr. James B. Conant, president of Harvard University, at the opening chapel service in the Harvard Memorial Church today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
